content.value:
I don’t do roommates but if I did I wouldn’t want to live with someone who didn’t think my life mattered, believed wild conspiracies, and supported domestic terrorism against our Capitol.

I want to feel safe in my home and I wouldn’t feel safe living with someone like that.
